title: Legoland Atlanta to host job fair for nearly 100 positions
title_page: Legoland Atlanta to host job fair for nearly 100 positions
text:
Legoland Discovery Center Atlanta will host a job fair soon for nearly 100 full-time and part-time positions.
On-site interviews will be conducted next month for positions available in management, guest experience, retail, food and beverage, janitorial and admissions.
Interested candidates must be at least 18 years of age and are encouraged to bring a copy of their resume and cover letter. Applicants must apply in advance here, and no appointment is necessary.
The fair will be held June 2 and June 3 from 11 a.m. to 5 p.m. at Legoland, located on Phipps Plaza’s third floor at 3500 Peachtree Road NE.
If policing is more your thing, an informational session and recruitment for MARTA to hire 20 police officers is also taking place May 6. And don’t forget that the Atlanta Fire Department is also looking to fill a bunch of positions.
